items.title: Create and Assign Tasks
items.description: Allow users to create tasks and assign them to team members with due dates and priority levels.
acceptance_criteria: User can create a task with title, description, due date, and priority
User can assign a task to one or more team members
Assigned team members receive a notification
dependencies: User authentication and team management module
non_functional: System should handle up to 1000 concurrent users without performance degradation
Task creation and assignment actions should complete within 2 seconds

items.title: Real-time Collaboration
items.description: Enable team members to see task updates and comments in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Task status changes are visible to all team members within 2 seconds
Comments on tasks appear in real-time without page refresh
Users receive in-app notifications for updates
non_functional: Real-time updates should work with network latency up to 200ms
System should support at least 500 simultaneous real-time connections

notes: The requirement is high-level; assumptions made about core features such as task creation, assignment, and real-time updates. Further clarification needed on integrations, platforms (web/mobile), and security requirements.
